1.content:
You are helping your family get everything ready for Thanksgiving because this year its not just for your family who live with you. No this year all of your family (Well only the girls from your family) are coming down and over half of them you never meet in person, but you know them all by face and name. And the only reason your the only male at this thanksgiving is because all the other men of your family are spending their thanksgiving out on tour for the next 3 years. And you were left behind because you don't like the kind of tour they left on. (It's a tour of every haunted spot in the world).

As your finishing your part of the work your mom tells you to stay in your room and see will slide your dinner under the door when its done. She then says that if you leave your room at all while the family is here you will be grounded until the guys get back from there tour. You think to yourself THAT'S 3 YEARS AWAY!!! With that said you go upto your room and close your door as everyone starts to arrive. You go over to your bed and see a gift addressed to you.

Do you open it?
1.title: Intro...

choices: A gun that can turn you into an ant
A ring that shrinks/grows you if worn
11.content:
You entered your room frustrated at your mothers odd rules. She always has the final word, why don’t you ever have a say in the matter? You’re 23 years old for crying out loud!

Picking up the gift on your bed and examining it, it was a typical large package - was it a Christmas gift? Regardless of Christmas being a month away, you decided to open it now. Tearing through the snowman covered wrapping paper and ripping through the card board box.. you found yourself gazing upon a....
11.title: Yes

113.content:
You turn on the gun that said “Insect Gun”
“Yeah right this has to be a gag gift” you say to yourself.

The options on the screen said

“What Do You Want to Become?”
A) Ant
B) Fly
C) Gnat

“This thing is ridiculous” you say as you press:
113.title: A gun that can turn you into an ant

1131.content:
You press the first option: Ant.

Suddenly the gun begins to vibrate and the end begins to glow. After a few seconds an aura shoots out from all sides. You barely have time to yelp in surprise as you are quickly engulfed. In no time you see the world around you rise up and up and up until you blackout completely.

When you wake up moments later, you take a look around you. Strange alien trees rose above you. You shook your head to shake away the dizziness but quickly realize your head felt different.. lifting your hands to your face you realize they’re no longer your hands... but that of insects! Wait a minute.. the gun.. the ant option.. you really were an ant! The trees around you were your bedroom carpet!

“Shit shit SHIT” you say out loud. “Ok.. ok don’t panic.. all I have to do is climb back up my bed, and somehow undo this..” You begin making your way through the forest of your carpet as fast as your newfound six legs can take you. You finally make it to one of your shirts draped over the edge of the bed. You begin the ascent on your shirts long sleeve, weaving over wrinkles until you reach the top of your bed. Hopping off your shirt you saw the monument of the gun ahead of you. Bingo. “Ok time to take care of this freak accident.” You make it over and gaze up. The gun was the size of a building, but that doesn’t seem to be an obstacle to you anymore.

Midway up the gun you are interrupted by a loud sound behind you.. your ant sense alert you that someone has entered the room..

You turn and see ______
1131.title: Ant

11312.content:
“Hey mom said that... hello?” Emma said as she walked into your room and taken aback that you weren’t there. “That’s so weird he literally just walked in here ten minutes ago..”

Emma was a short brunette with freckles. Between her and Josie, she and you were closer. But man, she could be a brat sometimes.

Tucking the rest of her waffle knit, burgundy, button down sweater into her jeans, she casually waltzed into your room carelessly picking up items on your dresser and putting them back just as apathetically. She began walking right up to your bed.

The loud booms of her footfalls shook even the comforter beneath your ant feet. “Oh man, she’s huge” you said out loud. You could understand your voice but could she? You knew it was hopeless to get Emma’s attention. Why on Earth would her first thought when seeing you be “oh look it’s my brother, I better help him”... no, this is about survival. You needed to get atop this insect gun before you before she really does see you and, God for it, squash you.

Wasting no more time, you crawl up the side of the gun.

“Gosh his room is a mess”. At your bed, Emma decides to sit and wait for you. Moving your shirt, a few other articles of clothes and other random materials out of her way, she plops down onto your bed.

The shockwave of this affected the gun, and you now on top of it. The impact flipped the gun up and between the wall and the bed only to crash to the floor below. Luckily the flipping device flung you off before it crash landed into the pit.

Your tiny ant form screamed as you landed...
11312.title: Apex Emma
